description: [KV Botnet Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0035) gathers a list of filenames from the following locations during execution of the final botnet stage: \/usr\/sbin\/, \/usr\/bin\/, \/sbin\/, \/pfrm2.0\/bin\/, \/usr\/local\/bin\/.(Citation: Lumen KVBotnet 2023)

external_references.description: Black Lotus Labs. (2023, December 13). Routers Roasting On An Open Firewall: The KV-Botnet Investigation. Retrieved June 10, 2024.
